column5: I'm sorry I really didn't mean it that way.

This. Why am I such a coward? Like bitch, kill yourself already.

edit: the bitch is me. not anyone else, thanks.

exactly this. I don't want to kill myself I just want to cease existing. 
the overwhelming feeling of reality really just _sucks_

I can agree with you, I'm in the same boat my friend.

but everyday it feels like the guilt keeps chewing out some part of me. 

i hope one day we both can make it out :)
